title: Roberta Gregory - Naughty Bits
description:
Naughty Bits was published quarterly by Fantagraphics (sometimes... it was usually at least three times a year until near the end of the run). I'd love to see this one return, or something like it from Roberta Gregory, because it was a fun, entertaining read. This book always felt a little to me like Roberta was keeping the underground comix torch burning. Considering it lasted until 2004 that's quite a feat. TPB has been missing this one, so I'm glad to pass it along (thanks to the scanners for finally completing this one).

-------------------------------------------------------------

Naughty Bits 1-40

Fantagraphics, 1991-2004

Written and Illustrated by Roberta Gregory

The story of Midge McCracken, aka Bitchy Bitch, the everyday life of a woman
